synopsis.text:
Firebreathing dragons walk among us, disguised as ordinary humans. The Ryudo brothers, four seemingly normal individuals, harbor an extraordinary secret: they are descendants of ancient dragons, possessing incredible speed, strength, and power. When pushed to their limits, they transform into the fearsome dragons of legend. Their unique abilities have caught the attention of formidable adversaries, including the enigmatic Kamukura no Gozen, a man of immense wealth and influence who will stop at nothing to unravel the brothers' secret.

As the world teeters on the brink of destruction, the Ryudo brothers must embrace their destiny and protect humanity from the looming darkness. With their friends caught in the crossfire, they can no longer afford to live in peace. The time has come for them to unleash their true potential and confront their enemies head-on. Prepare for a world of enchantment and high-stakes action as the Ryudo brothers embark on a thrilling journey to save mankind from the brink of extinction.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
